;;;327    		}

;;;612    					}

;;;762    						SI4730_SetAMFreq(g_pFM->usFreq);

                  |L1.2728|

                  |L1.2732|
;;;763    					}
;;;764    					fRefresh = 1;

;;;765    					break;

                  |L1.2736|

                  |L1.2758|
;;;772    					}

;;;775    					break;
;;;776    
;;;777    				case JOY_DOWN_D:			/* 摇杆DOWN键按下 */
;;;778    					if (g_pFM->ucVolume > 0)

000ac8  f890130c          LDRB     r1,[r0,#0x30c]

000ad0  f880130c          STRB     r1,[r0,#0x30c]        ;771

;;;779    					{
;;;780    						g_pFM->ucVolume -= VOLUME_STEP;
;;;781    					}
;;;782    					else
;;;783    					{
;;;784    						g_pFM->ucVolume = 0;
;;;785    					}
;;;786    					radio_AdjustVolume(g_pFM->ucVolume);	
000ad4  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000ad6  f7fffffe          BL       radio_AdjustVolume
;;;787    					fRefresh = 1;
;;;788    					break;
000ada  e7e7              B        |L1.2732|
                  |L1.2780|
;;;789    
;;;790    				case JOY_DOWN_L:			/* 摇杆LEFT键按下 */
;;;791    					if (g_pFM->ucMode == FM_RX)
000adc  6821              LDR      r1,[r4,#0]  ; g_pFM
000ade  7848              LDRB     r0,[r1,#1]
000ae0  b120              CBZ      r0,|L1.2796|
;;;792    					{
;;;793    						if (g_pFM->ucIndexFM > 0)
;;;794    						{
;;;795    							g_pFM->ucIndexFM--;
;;;796    							g_pFM->usFreq = g_pFM->usFMList[g_pFM->ucIndexFM];
;;;797    							SI4730_SetFMFreq(g_pFM->usFreq );
;;;798    							fRefresh = 1;
;;;799    						}
;;;800    					}
;;;801    					else
;;;802    					{
;;;803    						if (g_pFM->ucIndexAM > 0)
000ae2  f8910304          LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x304]
000ae6  b378              CBZ      r0,|L1.2888|
000ae8  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
;;;804    						{
;;;805    							g_pFM->ucIndexAM--;
;;;806    							g_pFM->usFreq = g_pFM->usAMList[g_pFM->ucIndexAM];
;;;807    							SI4730_SetAMFreq(g_pFM->usFreq );
;;;808    							fRefresh = 1;
000aea  e00f              B        |L1.2828|
                  |L1.2796|
000aec  f8910202          LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x202]        ;793
000af0  b350              CBZ      r0,|L1.2888|
000af2  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;793
000af4  e01d              B        |L1.2866|
                  |L1.2806|
;;;809    						}
;;;810    					}
;;;811    					break;
;;;812    
;;;813    				case JOY_DOWN_R:			/* 摇杆RIGHT键按下 */
;;;814    					if (g_pFM->ucMode == FM_RX)
000af6  6821              LDR      r1,[r4,#0]  ; g_pFM
000af8  7848              LDRB     r0,[r1,#1]
000afa  b198              CBZ      r0,|L1.2852|
;;;815    					{
;;;816    						if (g_pFM->ucIndexFM < g_pFM->ucFMCount - 1)
;;;817    						{
;;;818    							g_pFM->ucIndexFM++;
;;;819    							g_pFM->usFreq = g_pFM->usFMList[g_pFM->ucIndexFM];
;;;820    							SI4730_SetFMFreq(g_pFM->usFreq );
;;;821    							fRefresh = 1;
;;;822    						}
;;;823    					}
;;;824    					else
;;;825    					{
;;;826    						if (g_pFM->ucIndexAM < g_pFM->ucAMCount - 1)
000afc  f8912203          LDRB     r2,[r1,#0x203]
000b00  f8910304          LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x304]
000b04  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
000b06  4290              CMP      r0,r2
000b08  da1f              BGE      |L1.2890|
000b0a  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
                  |L1.2828|
;;;827    						{
;;;828    							g_pFM->ucIndexAM++;
000b0c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000b0e  f8810304          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x304]
;;;829    							g_pFM->usFreq = g_pFM->usAMList[g_pFM->ucIndexAM];
000b12  eb010040          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #1
000b16  f8b00204          LDRH     r0,[r0,#0x204]
                  |L1.2842|
;;;830    							SI4730_SetAMFreq(g_pFM->usFreq );
000b1a  f8c10308          STR      r0,[r1,#0x308]
000b1e  f7fffffe          BL       SI4730_SetAMFreq
000b22  e7c3              B        |L1.2732|
                  |L1.2852|
000b24  78ca              LDRB     r2,[r1,#3]            ;816
000b26  f8910202          LDRB     r0,[r1,#0x202]        ;816
000b2a  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1              ;816
000b2c  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;816
000b2e  da0c              BGE      |L1.2890|
000b30  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;816
                  |L1.2866|
000b32  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;818
000b34  f8810202          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x202]        ;818
000b38  eb010040          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #1       ;819
000b3c  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]            ;819
                  |L1.2878|
000b3e  f8c10308          STR      r0,[r1,#0x308]        ;820
000b42  f7fffffe          BL       SI4730_SetFMFreq
000b46  e7b1              B        |L1.2732|
                  |L1.2888|
000b48  e7ff              B        |L1.2890|
                  |L1.2890|
000b4a  2f00              CMP      r7,#0                 ;429
000b4c  f43fac34          BEQ      |L1.952|
;;;831    							fRefresh = 1;
;;;832    						}
;;;833    					}
;;;834    					break;
;;;835    
;;;836    				case JOY_DOWN_OK:			/* 摇杆OK键按下 */
;;;837    					break;
;;;838    
;;;839    				default:
;;;840    					/* 其他的键值不处理 */
;;;841    					break;
;;;842    			}
;;;843    		}
;;;844    	}	//while (fQuit == 0)
;;;845    
;;;846    	if (fQuit == 1)
000b50  2f01              CMP      r7,#1
000b52  d101              BNE      |L1.2904|
;;;847    	{
;;;848    		SI4730_PowerDown();
000b54  f7fffffe          BL       SI4730_PowerDown
                  |L1.2904|
;;;849    	}
;;;850    
;;;851    	bsp_StopTimer(0);	/* 停止定时器0 */
000b58  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000b5a  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_StopTimer
;;;852    
;;;853    	radio_SaveParam();	/* 保存电台参数 */
000b5e  f7fffffe          BL       radio_SaveParam
;;;854    }
000b62  f20d4d14          ADD      sp,sp,#0x414
000b66  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
;;;855    
                          ENDP

000b6a  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.2924|
                          DCD      g_LcdWidth
                  |L1.2928|
                          DCD      g_LcdHeight

                          AREA ||i.radio_AM_FreqList||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  radio_AM_FreqList PROC
;;;1038   */
;;;1039   static void radio_AM_FreqList(uint8_t _ucAll)
000000  4a18              LDR      r2,|L2.100|
;;;1040   {
000002  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
000004  6811              LDR      r1,[r2,#0]
000006  b120              CBZ      r0,|L2.18|
;;;1041   	/* 预填武汉地区的电台列表 */
;;;1042   	uint8_t i;
;;;1043   
;;;1044   	if (_ucAll == 0)
;;;1045   	{
;;;1046   		g_pFM->ucAMCount = sizeof(g_InitListAM) / 2;
;;;1047   		for (i = 0 ;i < g_pFM->ucAMCount; i ++)
;;;1048   		{
;;;1049   			g_pFM->usAMList[i] = g_InitListAM[i];
;;;1050   		}
;;;1051   	}
;;;1052   	else
;;;1053   	{
;;;1054   		/*
;;;1055   			步长 9KHz
;;;1056   		*/
;;;1057   		g_pFM->ucAMCount = 120;
000008  2078              MOVS     r0,#0x78
00000a  f8810203          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x203]
;;;1058   		for (i = 0 ;i < g_pFM->ucAMCount; i ++)
00000e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000010  e01e              B        |L2.80|
                  |L2.18|
000012  200d              MOVS     r0,#0xd               ;1046
000014  f8810203          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x203]        ;1046
000018  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;1047
00001a  4a13              LDR      r2,|L2.104|
00001c  e008              B        |L2.48|
00001e  bf00              NOP                            ;1049
                  |L2.32|
000020  f8323010          LDRH     r3,[r2,r0,LSL #1]     ;1049
000024  eb010440          ADD      r4,r1,r0,LSL #1       ;1049
000028  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1049
00002a  f8a43204          STRH     r3,[r4,#0x204]        ;1049
00002e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1047
                  |L2.48|
000030  f8913203          LDRB     r3,[r1,#0x203]        ;1047
000034  4283              CMP      r3,r0                 ;1047
000036  d8f3              BHI      |L2.32|
;;;1059   		{
;;;1060   			g_pFM->usAMList[i] = 531 + i*9;
;;;1061   		}
;;;1062   		g_pFM->ucIndexAM  = 0;
;;;1063   	}
;;;1064   }
000038  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
00003a  bf00              NOP                            ;1060
                  |L2.60|
00003c  eb0003c0          ADD      r3,r0,r0,LSL #3       ;1060
000040  eb010440          ADD      r4,r1,r0,LSL #1       ;1060
000044  f2032313          ADD      r3,r3,#0x213          ;1060
000048  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1060
00004a  f8a43204          STRH     r3,[r4,#0x204]        ;1060
00004e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1058
                  |L2.80|
000050  f8913203          LDRB     r3,[r1,#0x203]        ;1058
000054  4283              CMP      r3,r0                 ;1058
000056  d8f1              BHI      |L2.60|
000058  6811              LDR      r1,[r2,#0]            ;1062  ; g_pFM
00005a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;1062
00005c  f8810304          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x304]        ;1062
000060  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1065   
                          ENDP

000062  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.100|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L2.104|
                          DCD      ||.constdata||+0x26

                          AREA ||i.radio_AdjustVolume||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  radio_AdjustVolume PROC
;;;1113   */
;;;1114   static void radio_AdjustVolume(uint8_t _ucVolume)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1115   {
;;;1116   	uint8_t volume;
;;;1117   	
;;;1118   	wm8978_SetEarVolume(g_pFM->ucVolume);
000002  4c0c              LDR      r4,|L3.52|
000004  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; g_pFM
000006  f890030c          LDRB     r0,[r0,#0x30c]
00000a  f7fffffe          BL       wm8978_SetEarVolume
;;;1119   	wm8978_SetSpkVolume(g_pFM->ucVolume);
00000e  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; g_pFM
000010  f890030c          LDRB     r0,[r0,#0x30c]
000014  f7fffffe          BL       wm8978_SetSpkVolume
;;;1120   	
;;;1121   	if (g_pFM->ucVolume == 0)
000018  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; g_pFM
00001a  f890030c          LDRB     r0,[r0,#0x30c]
00001e  b128              CBZ      r0,|L3.44|
;;;1122   	{
;;;1123   		SI4730_SetOutVolume(0);
;;;1124   	}
;;;1125   	else
;;;1126   	{
;;;1127   		volume = 21 + (g_pFM->ucVolume * 2) / 3;
000020  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000022  2103              MOVS     r1,#3
000024  fbb0f0f1          UDIV     r0,r0,r1
000028  3015              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x15
00002a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L3.44|
;;;1128   		SI4730_SetOutVolume(volume);		
00002c  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
000030  f7ffbffe          B.W      SI4730_SetOutVolume
;;;1129   	}
;;;1130   }
;;;1131   
                          ENDP

                  |L3.52|
                          DCD      ||.data||

                          AREA ||i.radio_DispStatus||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          REQUIRE _printf_pre_padding
                          REQUIRE _printf_percent
                          REQUIRE _printf_widthprec
                          REQUIRE _printf_d
                          REQUIRE _printf_int_dec
                  radio_DispStatus PROC
;;;863    */
;;;864    static void radio_DispStatus(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;865    {
000002  b0a6              SUB      sp,sp,#0x98
;;;866    	char buf[128];
;;;867    	FONT_T tFont;			/* 定义一个字体结构体变量，用于设置字体参数 */
;;;868    	uint16_t usLineCap = 18;
;;;869    	uint16_t x, y;
;;;870    
;;;871    	/* 设置字体参数 */
;;;872    	{
;;;873    		tFont.FontCode = FC_ST_16;	/* 字体代码 16点阵 */
000004  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000006  f88d008c          STRB     r0,[sp,#0x8c]
;;;874    		tFont.FrontColor = CL_WHITE;	/* 字体颜色 */
00000a  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
00000e  f8ad008e          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x8e]
;;;875    		tFont.BackColor = CL_BLUE;	/* 文字背景颜色 */
000012  201f              MOVS     r0,#0x1f
000014  f8ad0090          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x90]
;;;876    		tFont.Space = 0;				/* 文字间距，单位 = 像素 */
000018  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00001a  f8ad0092          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x92]
;;;877    	}
;;;878    
;;;879    	if (g_pFM->ucMode == FM_RX)
00001e  481a              LDR      r0,|L4.136|
000020  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_pFM
000022  7841              LDRB     r1,[r0,#1]
000024  b1b1              CBZ      r1,|L4.84|
;;;880    	{
;;;881    		sprintf(buf, "FM (%3d/%d) 频率=%5d.%dMHz, Volume = %2d    ", g_pFM->ucIndexFM + 1,
;;;882    			g_pFM->ucFMCount, g_pFM->usFreq / 100,
;;;883    			(g_pFM->usFreq % 100) / 10, g_pFM->ucVolume);
;;;884    	}
;;;885    	else
;;;886    	{
;;;887    		sprintf(buf, "AM (%3d/%d) 频率=%5dKHz, Volume = %2d    ",g_pFM->ucIndexAM + 1,
000026  f890230c          LDRB     r2,[r0,#0x30c]
00002a  f8d01308          LDR      r1,[r0,#0x308]
00002e  e9cd1200          STRD     r1,r2,[sp,#0]
000032  f8902304          LDRB     r2,[r0,#0x304]
000036  f8903203          LDRB     r3,[r0,#0x203]
00003a  a114              ADR      r1,|L4.140|
00003c  a803              ADD      r0,sp,#0xc
00003e  1c52              ADDS     r2,r2,#1
000040  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
                  |L4.68|
;;;888    			g_pFM->ucAMCount,	g_pFM->usFreq, g_pFM->ucVolume);
;;;889    	}
;;;890    
;;;891    	x = 5;
000044  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
;;;892    	y = 80;
000046  2150              MOVS     r1,#0x50
;;;893    	LCD_DispStr(x, y, buf, &tFont);
000048  ab23              ADD      r3,sp,#0x8c
00004a  aa03              ADD      r2,sp,#0xc
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;894    	y += usLineCap;
;;;895    }
000050  b026              ADD      sp,sp,#0x98
000052  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L4.84|
000054  f8d03308          LDR      r3,[r0,#0x308]        ;881
000058  2164              MOVS     r1,#0x64              ;881
00005a  fbb3f2f1          UDIV     r2,r3,r1              ;881
00005e  fb013212          MLS      r2,r1,r2,r3           ;881
000062  240a              MOVS     r4,#0xa               ;881
000064  fbb3f1f1          UDIV     r1,r3,r1              ;881
000068  fbb2f2f4          UDIV     r2,r2,r4              ;881
00006c  f890330c          LDRB     r3,[r0,#0x30c]        ;881
000070  e88d000e          STM      sp,{r1-r3}            ;881
000074  f8902202          LDRB     r2,[r0,#0x202]        ;881
000078  78c3              LDRB     r3,[r0,#3]            ;881
00007a  a10f              ADR      r1,|L4.184|
00007c  a803              ADD      r0,sp,#0xc            ;881
00007e  1c52              ADDS     r2,r2,#1              ;881
000080  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
000084  e7de              B        |L4.68|
;;;896    
                          ENDP

000086  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.136|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L4.140|
00008c  414d2028          DCB      "AM (%3d/%d) ",198,181,194,202,"=%5dKHz, Volume = %2d   "
000090  2533642f
000094  25642920
000098  c6b5c2ca
00009c  3d253564

0000b6  00                DCB      0
0000b7  00                DCB      0
                  |L4.184|
0000b8  464d2028          DCB      "FM (%3d/%d) ",198,181,194,202,"=%5d.%dMHz, Volume = %2d"
0000bc  2533642f
0000c0  25642920
0000c4  c6b5c2ca

0000e4  00      
0000e5  00                DCB      0
0000e6  00                DCB      0
0000e7  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.radio_FM_FreqList||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  radio_FM_FreqList PROC
;;;1004   */
;;;1005   static void radio_FM_FreqList(uint8_t _ucAll)
000000  4910              LDR      r1,|L5.68|
;;;1006   {
000002  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1007   	/* 预填武汉地区的电台列表 */
;;;1008   	uint32_t i;
;;;1009   
;;;1010   	if (_ucAll == 0)
;;;1011   	{
;;;1012   		g_pFM->ucFMCount = sizeof(g_InitListFM) / 2;
000004  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]
000006  b178              CBZ      r0,|L5.40|
;;;1013   		for (i = 0 ;i < g_pFM->ucFMCount; i ++)
;;;1014   		{
;;;1015   			g_pFM->usFMList[i] = g_InitListFM[i];
;;;1016   		}
;;;1017   	}
;;;1018   	else
;;;1019   	{
;;;1020   		/*
;;;1021   			中国范围： 88-108兆赫信号调制方式是调频（频率调制）每个频道的频率间隔是0.1兆赫
;;;1022   		*/
;;;1023   		g_pFM->ucFMCount = 0;
000008  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00000a  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]
;;;1024   		for (i = 8800 ;i <= 10800; i += 10)
00000c  f2422060          MOV      r0,#0x2260
000010  f6422330          MOV      r3,#0x2a30
                  |L5.20|
;;;1025   		{
;;;1026   			g_pFM->usFMList[g_pFM->ucFMCount++] = i;
000014  78ca              LDRB     r2,[r1,#3]
000016  eb010442          ADD      r4,r1,r2,LSL #1
00001a  1c52              ADDS     r2,r2,#1
00001c  70ca              STRB     r2,[r1,#3]
00001e  80a0              STRH     r0,[r4,#4]
000020  300a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xa
000022  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;1024
000024  d9f6              BLS      |L5.20|
;;;1027   		}
;;;1028   	}
;;;1029   }
000026  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L5.40|
000028  2013              MOVS     r0,#0x13              ;1012
00002a  70c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#3]            ;1012
00002c  4a06              LDR      r2,|L5.72|
00002e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;1013
                  |L5.48|
000030  eb010440          ADD      r4,r1,r0,LSL #1       ;1015
000034  f8323010          LDRH     r3,[r2,r0,LSL #1]     ;1015
000038  80a3              STRH     r3,[r4,#4]            ;1015
00003a  78cb              LDRB     r3,[r1,#3]            ;1013
00003c  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1013
00003e  4283              CMP      r3,r0                 ;1013
000040  d8f6              BHI      |L5.48|
000042  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1030   
                          ENDP

                  |L5.68|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L5.72|
                          DCD      ||.constdata||

                          AREA ||i.radio_SaveParam||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  radio_SaveParam PROC
;;;1093   */
;;;1094   static void radio_SaveParam(void)
000000  480a              LDR      r0,|L6.44|
;;;1095   {
;;;1096   	g_tParam.ucRadioMode     = g_pFM->ucMode;				/* AM 或 FM */
000002  6801              LDR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; g_pFM
000004  480a              LDR      r0,|L6.48|
000006  784a              LDRB     r2,[r1,#1]
000008  f8002f40          STRB     r2,[r0,#0x40]!
;;;1097   	g_tParam.ucRadioListType = g_pFM->ucListType;			/* 电台列表类型。武汉地区或全国 */
00000c  788a              LDRB     r2,[r1,#2]
00000e  7042              STRB     r2,[r0,#1]
;;;1098   	g_tParam.ucIndexFM       = g_pFM->ucIndexFM;			/* 当前FM电台索引 */
000010  f8912202          LDRB     r2,[r1,#0x202]
000014  7082              STRB     r2,[r0,#2]
;;;1099   	g_tParam.ucIndexAM       = g_pFM->ucIndexAM;			/* 当前电台索引 */
000016  f8912304          LDRB     r2,[r1,#0x304]
00001a  70c2              STRB     r2,[r0,#3]
;;;1100   	g_tParam.ucRadioVolume   = g_pFM->ucVolume;			/* 音量 */
00001c  f891230c          LDRB     r2,[r1,#0x30c]
000020  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1101   	g_tParam.ucSpkOutEn      = g_pFM->ucSpkOutEn;			/* 扬声器输出使能 */
000022  f891130d          LDRB     r1,[r1,#0x30d]
000026  7141              STRB     r1,[r0,#5]
;;;1102   
;;;1103   	SaveParam();
000028  f7ffbffe          B.W      SaveParam
;;;1104   }
;;;1105   
                          ENDP

                  |L6.44|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L6.48|
                          DCD      g_tParam

                          AREA ||i.radio_SignalQuality||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          REQUIRE _printf_percent
                          REQUIRE _printf_d
                          REQUIRE _printf_int_dec
                          REQUIRE _printf_pre_padding
                          REQUIRE _printf_flags
                          REQUIRE _printf_widthprec
                  radio_SignalQuality PROC
;;;904    */
;;;905    static void radio_SignalQuality(void)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;906    {
000004  b0a6              SUB      sp,sp,#0x98
;;;907    	char buf[128];
;;;908    	FONT_T tFont;			/* 定义一个字体结构体变量，用于设置字体参数 */
;;;909    	uint8_t read_buf[7];
;;;910    	uint16_t x, y;
;;;911    
;;;912    	/* 设置字体参数 */
;;;913    	{
;;;914    		tFont.FontCode = FC_ST_16;	/* 字体代码 16点阵 */
000006  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000008  f88d0090          STRB     r0,[sp,#0x90]
;;;915    		tFont.FrontColor = CL_WHITE;	/* 字体颜色 */
00000c  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000010  f8ad0092          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x92]
;;;916    		tFont.BackColor = CL_BLUE;	/* 文字背景颜色 */
000014  201f              MOVS     r0,#0x1f
000016  f8ad0094          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x94]
;;;917    		tFont.Space = 0;				/* 文字间距，单位 = 像素 */
;;;918    	}
;;;919    	x = 5;
;;;920    	y = 100;
;;;921    
;;;922    	if (g_pFM->ucMode == FM_RX)
00001a  4829              LDR      r0,|L7.192|
00001c  f04f0800          MOV      r8,#0                 ;917
000020  f8ad8096          STRH     r8,[sp,#0x96]         ;917
000024  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_pFM
000026  2605              MOVS     r6,#5                 ;919
000028  2564              MOVS     r5,#0x64              ;920
00002a  7840              LDRB     r0,[r0,#1]
00002c  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;923    	{
;;;924    		uint8_t rssi, snr, cap;
;;;925    
;;;926    		SI4730_GetFMSignalQuality(read_buf);
;;;927    		/*
;;;928    			CMD      0x23    FM_RSQ_STATUS
;;;929    			ARG1     0x01    Clear RSQINT
;;;930    			STATUS   ?0x80   Reply Status. Clear-to-send high.
;;;931    			RESP1    ?0x00   No blend, SNR high, low, RSSI high or low interrupts.
;;;932    			RESP2    ?0x01   Soft mute is not engaged, no AFC rail, valid frequency.
;;;933    			RESP3    ?0xD9   Pilot presence, 89% blend
;;;934    			RESP4    ?0x2D   RSSI = 45 dBμV
;;;935    			RESP5    ?0x33   SNR = 51 dB
;;;936    			RESP6    ?0x00
;;;937    			RESP7    ?0x00   Freq offset = 0 kHz
;;;938    		*/		
;;;939    		rssi = read_buf[3];
;;;940    		snr = read_buf[4];
;;;941    		
;;;942    		SI4730_GetFMTuneStatus(read_buf);
;;;943    		/*
;;;944    			CMD      0x22     FM_TUNE_STATUS
;;;945    			ARG1     0x01     Clear STC interrupt.
;;;946    			STATUS   ?0x80    Reply Status. Clear-to-send high.
;;;947    
;;;948    			RESP1    ?0x01    Valid Frequency.
;;;949    			RESP2    ?0x27    Frequency = 0x27F6 = 102.3 MHz
;;;950    			RESP3    ?0xF6
;;;951    			RESP4    ?0x2D    RSSI = 45 dBμV
;;;952    			RESP5    ?0x33    SNR = 51 dB
;;;953    			RESP6    ?0x00    MULT[7:0]
;;;954    			RESP7    ?0x00    Antenna tuning capacitor = 0 (range = 0C191)  READANTCAP[7:0] (Si4704/05/06/2x only)
;;;955    		*/	
;;;956    		cap = read_buf[6];
;;;957    		
;;;958    		sprintf(buf, "RSSI = %ddBuV  SNR = %ddB CAP = %d",  rssi, snr, cap);
;;;959    
;;;960    		LCD_DispStrEx(x, y, buf, &tFont, 300, ALIGN_LEFT);			
;;;961    	}
;;;962    	else
;;;963    	{
;;;964    		uint32_t cap;
;;;965    
;;;966    		/* 读取AM调谐状态 */
;;;967    		SI4730_GetAMTuneStatus(read_buf);		
00002e  a822              ADD      r0,sp,#0x88
000030  d029              BEQ      |L7.134|
000032  f7fffffe          BL       SI4730_GetAMTuneStatus
;;;968    		/*
;;;969    			CMD       0x42           AM_TUNE_STATUS
;;;970    			ARG1      0x01           Clear STC interrupt.
;;;971    			STATUS    ?0x80          Reply Status. Clear-to-send high.
;;;972    
;;;973    			RESP1     ?0x01          Channel is valid
;;;974    			RESP2     ?0x03
;;;975    			RESP3     ?0xE8          Frequency = 0x03E8 = 1000 kHz
;;;976    			RESP4     ?0x2A          RSSI = 0x2A = 42d = 42 dBμV
;;;977    			RESP5     ?0x1A          SNR = 0x1A = 26d = 26 dB
;;;978    			RESP6     ?0x0D          Value the antenna tuning capacitor is set to.
;;;979    			RESP7     ?0x95          0x0D95 = 3477 dec.
;;;980    
;;;981    			电容计算 The tuning capacitance is 95 fF x READANTCAP + 7 pF			
;;;982    		*/	
;;;983    		cap = (read_buf[5] << 8) | read_buf[6];
000036  f8bd008d          LDRH     r0,[sp,#0x8d]
;;;984    		cap = (cap * 95)  + 7000;	/* 实测 342pF -- 10pF */
00003a  f6413158          MOV      r1,#0x1b58
00003e  ba42              REV16    r2,r0                 ;983
000040  ebc21042          RSB      r0,r2,r2,LSL #5
000044  eb001082          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSL #6
000048  1844              ADDS     r4,r0,r1
;;;985    		
;;;986    		/* 读取AM信号质量 */
;;;987    		SI4730_GetAMSignalQuality(read_buf);
00004a  a822              ADD      r0,sp,#0x88
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       SI4730_GetAMSignalQuality
;;;988    		
;;;989    		sprintf(buf, "RSSI = %ddBuV  SNR = %ddB  Tuning Cap. = %d.%03dpF    ", 
000050  f44f717a          MOV      r1,#0x3e8
000054  fbb4f0f1          UDIV     r0,r4,r1
000058  fb014010          MLS      r0,r1,r0,r4
00005c  fbb4f1f1          UDIV     r1,r4,r1
000060  e9cd1000          STRD     r1,r0,[sp,#0]
000064  f89d308c          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0x8c]
000068  f89d208b          LDRB     r2,[sp,#0x8b]
00006c  a115              ADR      r1,|L7.196|
00006e  a802              ADD      r0,sp,#8
000070  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
;;;990    				read_buf[3], read_buf[4], cap / 1000, cap % 1000);
;;;991    		LCD_DispStr(x, y, buf, &tFont);					
000074  ab24              ADD      r3,sp,#0x90
000076  aa02              ADD      r2,sp,#8
000078  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00007a  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00007c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
                  |L7.128|
;;;992    	}
;;;993    
;;;994    	
;;;995    }
000080  b026              ADD      sp,sp,#0x98
000082  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
                  |L7.134|
000086  f7fffffe          BL       SI4730_GetFMSignalQuality
00008a  f89d708b          LDRB     r7,[sp,#0x8b]         ;939
00008e  f89d408c          LDRB     r4,[sp,#0x8c]         ;940
000092  a822              ADD      r0,sp,#0x88           ;942
000094  f7fffffe          BL       SI4730_GetFMTuneStatus
000098  f89d008e          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0x8e]         ;956
00009c  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]            ;958
00009e  4623              MOV      r3,r4                 ;958
0000a0  463a              MOV      r2,r7                 ;958
0000a2  a116              ADR      r1,|L7.252|
0000a4  a802              ADD      r0,sp,#8              ;958
0000a6  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
0000aa  f44f7196          MOV      r1,#0x12c             ;960
0000ae  e9cd1800          STRD     r1,r8,[sp,#0]         ;960
0000b2  ab24              ADD      r3,sp,#0x90           ;960
0000b4  aa02              ADD      r2,sp,#8              ;960
0000b6  4629              MOV      r1,r5                 ;960
0000b8  4630              MOV      r0,r6                 ;960
0000ba  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStrEx
0000be  e7df              B        |L7.128|
;;;996    
                          ENDP

                  |L7.192|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L7.196|
0000c4  52535349          DCB      "RSSI = %ddBuV  SNR = %ddB  Tuning Cap. = %d.%03dpF    ",0
